channel.title: Content-based predict on Ayamir's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Content-based predict on Ayamir's Blog

item.title: Note for Content Based Vp for Live Streaming (2)
item.author: miracle_l@bupt.edu.cn (Ayamir)
item.description: LiveObj LiveDeep方法利用卷积层从视频内容中提取深层特征，不受动态背景的影响。然而在整个推流会话中需要更新一个带有大量权重的巨大的神经网络模

item.title: Content Based VP for Live Streaming (1)
item.author: miracle_l@bupt.edu.cn (Ayamir)
item.description: LiveMotion Motivation 基于视频中物体的运动模式来做对应的FoV预测。 将用户的FoV轨迹与视频内容中运动物体的轨迹结合到一起考虑： 细节可以参见：note-for

item.title: Note for Content Assisted Prediction

item.description: 论文概况 Link：Content Assisted Viewport Prediction for Panoramic Video Streaming Level：IEEE CVPR 2019 CV4ARVR Keywords：Trajectory-based predict，C

item.title: Note for Content Motion Viewport Prediction

item.description: 论文概况 Link：Viewport Prediction for Live 360-Degree Mobile Video Streaming Using User-Content Hybrid Motion Tracking Level：Proceedings of the ACM on Interactive, Mobile, Wearable and Ubiquitous Technologies 2019 Keywords：View
